description: Ambiguous reference to 'the meeting with marketing' when calendar has two similar events. Tests disambiguation through conversation context.

events.title: Marketing Campaign Review
events.reasoning: Alice initially referred to 'the meeting with marketing' ambiguously, but Carol clarified there are two marketing meetings. Alice specified the Tuesday campaign review should move to Thursday at the same time (2 PM). Matches calendar event [1].
events.assumptions: Duration and location kept the same as original

mock_llm_response.summary: Moved the Tuesday marketing campaign review to Thursday at 2 PM.

notes: Reference datetime is Monday 2026-02-16. Calendar has two marketing-related events to test disambiguation. Only the campaign review [1] should be updated.
